creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, pink, green; edged with flat metallic strips; embroidered cutouts of flowers and petals joined together with thread; white teal and green beads; cutouts hang from scalloped, embroidered black yoke; finished with glued braid at neck edge; knot button and loop at back; collar forms circle when fastened
title: (Wedding?) Collar
